question: The deadline for filing GST annual return for 2018-19 has been extended till which date, as per the announcement made in October 2020?
explanation:
The Union Government has recently extended the deadline for filing GST annual return for the financial year 2018-19 by a month till 31st October of this year.
Taxpayers with aggregate annual turnover above two crore rupees are mandated to furnish the Annual return. Registered persons with aggregate turnover above five crore rupees should furnish reconciliation statement.
